item.title: By: Michael Moncur
item.dc:creator: Michael Moncur
item.description: I use <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/GNU_Screen" rel="nofollow">screen</a> as the shell on my machines I ssh into and as a side effect, it keeps timeouts from happening. Even if you do get disconnected, none of your jobs are stopped and it lets you "re-attach" to your session.
